text1: A launcher deploying several special canister holding shell in a near critical state. Detonating after some time and targetting the closest enemy.
A large launcher carrying lotus charges, contains multiple internal rotary magazines that allow the weapon to hold more ammunition.

An extremely long-range, high damage energy beam cannon, the Ion Laser is able to fire more and more destructive energy arcs through shields as the target's hard flux levels go up - at a hefty flux cost for the firing ship.
